definition: Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development, OECD/abbr. for 經濟合作與發展組織|经济合作与发展组织
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

pinyin: Ya4 Tai4 Jing1 He2 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: But the OECD figure is quite different to the official Chinese figures.
sentences.chinese: 但是经合组织的数字与中国官方的统计数据迥异。

sentences.english: The organisation has now broken out numbers on wireless broadband subscriptions.
sentences.chinese: 目前经合组织统计出了无线宽带用户的数量。

sentences.english: He also chaired the editorial board of OECD Economic Studies.
sentences.chinese: 他同时担任“经合组织经济学研究”编委会主席。

sentences.english: E. C. D. countries that the number of nurses is too small toresponserespond to the demand.
sentences.chinese: 大多数经合组织成员国担心护士短缺无法满足需求。

sentences.english: The Chinese Statistical Bureau provides data more easily than the OECD.
sentences.chinese: 中国国家统计局比经合组织更容易提供数据。

sentences.english: There are concerns in most O. E. C. D. countries that the number of nurses is too small to respond to the demand.
sentences.chinese: 大多数经合组织成员国担心护士太少会无法满足需求。

sentences.english: Thomas Liebig is the an economist in at the OECD.
sentences.chinese: 托马斯李比希是经合组织的一名经济学家。

sentences.english: The 30-nation OECD brings together nations committed to democracy and a free-market economy.
sentences.chinese: 经合组织由致力于民主和自由市场经济的30国组成。

sentences.english: By contrast, Asian OECD countries Japan and South Korea are the leanest.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，经合组织的亚洲成员国日本和韩国最瘦。

sentences.english: Here's the OECD's graph of Gini coefficients by country.
sentences.chinese: 下图是经合组织按照国家排序的基尼系数。
